column1: [Grizzlies PR] Grizzlies players out tonight: Grayson Allen (soreness), Kyle Anderson (soreness), Dillon Brooks (soreness), Brandon Clarke (soreness), Jaren Jackson Jr. (soreness), Sean McDermott (soreness), Jonas Valanciunas (soreness), Ja Morant (soreness)
[Grizzlies PR] The Memphis Grizzlies today announced the team signed guard Ahmad Caver and forward Matthew Hurt and waived wing Sean McDermott and forward Romeo Weems.
